group_1.narration: We were led to the trailer of Livia,@a self-proclaimed traveling coordinator.
According to her, she’s Mitama’s mentor@who happened to be in the area.

group_1.textLeft: I’ll see to ‘em,@so you two hit the hay.

group_1.textRight: So you were Mitama’s mentor...

group_1.textLeft: Kamihama’s on the other side of the mountain,@so we're technically not in her territory...

group_1.textRight: (Oh, the villa’s in Kamihama, but this@is outside city limits...)

group_1.textLeft: We’re not taking customers in the city, so we’ve got@an excuse if Mitama’s got anythin’ to say ‘bout that!

group_1.textRight: And Kushu...?
I’m just a client.
I’ve been patrolling this area lately...

group_1.textLeft: One who doesn’t make appointments,@at that.
I see… By the way, Kushu,@I’ve been meaning to ask you…
Would it be okay to be more casual with each@other? I’m in middle school, 2nd year.

group_1.textRight: I don't mind either way, but... I’m@one year above you, I think.
Although you'll catch up with me if@I end up having to repeat a year.

group_1.textLeft: No, that’s not how it normally works, right?@Students don’t repeat years in middle school.

group_1.textRight: Did I say something wrong?!

group_1.textLeft: Not a clue, but it seems like a touchy subject...

group_1.textRight: So... The reason we’re here today is this robot.
…*Whir*…

group_1.textLeft: What kinda robot is this? Well... I guess@ya could call it a magic doll?
A Magical Girl musta put magic in a block@toy, or somethin’.

group_1.textRight: Is that so?

group_1.textLeft: I've seen a lotta kids in my line ‘o work, and@some ‘o them do have that kinda magic.
...Well, in this case, it oughta be “had.”
It looks like a very old doll.@We’re talkin’ decades old...

group_1.textRight: What sort of magic is cast on it?

group_1.textLeft: From what I can tell... I’m guessin’ it’s@got an order to carry out a mission.

group_1.narration: “When certain conditions are met,@wake up and proceed towards the@Voice Between the Waves.”

group_1.textRight: Huh...

group_1.textLeft: And, when it gets where it’s goin’,@it’s suppose t’ do somethin’.
Like fetch somethin’, or deliver a@message to someone.
Simple mission like that,@nothin’ complicated.

group_1.textRight: Nothing complicated?

group_1.textLeft: As ya can see, it’s a piece ‘o junk. Not@a whole lotta magic left in it.
It’s only gotta 'bout two to three days@left ‘fore it kicks the bucket.

group_1.textRight: What...?!
It’s been working for decades, but you’re@telling me it’s about to break down...?
It’s only recently woken up and started@moving around, right?
Maybe it was in sleep mode until now@and didn’t use any power...?

group_1.textLeft: Right on the money.
(Then...)
(In a few more days, the doll will turn@back to its original state...?)

group_1.textRight: ...Is there anything else that you can@tell us?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
I could do a bit ‘o diggin’ into the@magic cast on this lil’ guy.

group_1.textRight: Really? You’ll do that?

group_1.textLeft: Gotta give ya your money's worth, right?@That's the way we do things.
